text: hananimkkeseo mid-eum-eul wijeunghaneun namseong-gwa yeoseong namseong-ui bulsinjawa yeo seong-ui bulsinja hananim-e daehayeo sa aghan eogcheug-eul haneun ja-ege eungbeol-eul naelisini saaghan geosdeul-i geudeul ju byeon-eul maemdolila ttohan hananimkkeseo geudeul-eul noyeowo hasa geudeul-eul jeoju hayeo geudeul-eul wihae jiog-eul junbiha yeo dusyeoss-euni saagham-i geudeul-ui un myeong-ila
